fields.name: Red Hair and Anesthetics (rs1805007)
fields.summary: have a 13-20x higher chance of having red hair. This snp is also associated with an increased response to anesthetics and an increased risk of melanoma.
fields.description: Many cases of red hair are due to the rs1805007 SNP in the MC1R gene. This is significantly linked to a large proportion of Celtic ancestry. In addition, red head females  with the gene are linked to being more responsive to the anesthetics pentazocine, nalbuphine, and butorphanol.

fields.name: Blue or Green Eyes (rs7495174)
fields.summary: are more likely to have blue or green eyes.
fields.description: On the OCA2 gene. Linked to blue and green eye color in Caucasians.

fields.name: Muscle Composition (rs1815739)
fields.summary: are more likely to have better performing muscles and be a sprinter.
fields.description: The rs1815739 SNP is in the ACTN3 gene. People with a positive CC genotype are likely to have better performing muscles and be sprinters. This genotype encodes a polymorphism responsible for fast twitch muscle fibers responsible for generating force at high velocities.

fields.name: Adventurous Personality (rs1800955)
fields.summary: are less likely to have an adventurous personality.

fields.name: Cilantro Soapiness (rs7107418)
fields.summary: are more likely to think cilantro tastes like soap

fields.name: Caffeine Consumption (rs4410790)
fields.summary: are more likely to habitually consume more caffeine

fields.name: Alcohol Flush Reaction (rs671)
fields.summary: are more likely to have their face and neck turn red after drinking alcohol

fields.name: Asparagus Odor Detection (rs4481887)
fields.summary: are less likely to to be able to smell asparagus metabolites in urine

fields.name: Blue vs Brown Eyes (rs12913832)
fields.summary: are 99% more likely to have blue eye color.

fields.name: Lactose Intolerance (rs4988235)
fields.summary: are likely to be lactose intolerant as an adult.
fields.description: SNP rs4988235 is associated with lactose intolerance in adults. Individuals with a CC genotype are likely to be lactose intolerant as adults, while those with a TT genotype are able to digest milk.

fields.name: Restless Leg Syndrome (rs3923809)
fields.summary: are 2x more likely to develop restless leg syndrome

fields.name: Tasting Bitterness (rs713598)
fields.summary: are possibly unable to taste bitter in some foods

fields.name: Earwax (rs17822931)
fields.summary: have dry earwax and no body odor.

fields.name: Skin Pigmentation (rs1426654)
fields.summary: are more likely to be dark skinned.

fields.name: Saturated Fat and Obesity (rs5082)
fields.summary: are more likely to gain weight from a diet high in saturated fat
